name: Baizhi
description: Baizhi is a researcher in Remnant Ecoacoustics. Baizhi's once unfulfilled wish has now manifested as her loyal companion. The Remnant Creature You'tan is her source of healing powers, and a lifelong research focus.

details.Basic Attack: Baizhi instructs You'tan to perform up to 4 consecutive attacks, dealing Glacio DMG.
details.Heavy Attack: Continuously consumes Stamina to command You'tan to attack enemies, dealing Glacio DMG. During Heavy Attack, Baizhi can command You'tan to move.
details.Mid-air Attack: Consumes Stamina and summons You’tan in mid-air to perform a Plunging Attack, dealing Glacio DMG.
details.Dodge Counter: Use Basic Attack after a successful Dodge to attack the target, dealing Glacio DMG.

resonance_skill.name: Emergency Plan
resonance_skill.description: Baizhi calls You'tan to attack the target, dealing Glacio DMG while restoring HP for the entire team.

resonance_liberation.name: Momentary Union
resonance_liberation.description: Summons You'tan to restore HP for the entire team, generating 4 stacks of Remnant Entities. Remnant Entities follow the active team members and automatically consume 1 stack every 2.5s, dealing Glacio DMG on hit while restoring HP to all nearby team members.

details.You'tan: A Remnant Creature that answers to Baizhi’s mind and desires while sharing all her attributes. You’tan returns to Baizhi when she dodges.
details.Concentration (healing): Baizhi consumes all "Concentrations" when casting Heavy Attack or Emergency Plan to continuously restore HP to nearby characters. Each 1 "Concentration" consumed triggers a heal once every 2s.
details.Energy Refunds: Consuming "Concentration" with Heavy Attack additionally restores Concerto Energy and Resonance Energy; consuming it with Emergency Plan additionally restores Concerto Energy.
details.Gain Concentration: Baizhi can hold up to 4 "Concentrations" and gains 1 "Concentration" for every Basic Attack on hit.

inherent_skill1.name: Harmonic Range
inherent_skill1.description: When Baizhi casts Emergency Plan, You'tan generates a field of Euphonia that lasts for 15s. Picking up Euphonia increases the ATK of the Resonator who picks it up by 15% for 20s.

inherent_skill2.name: Stimulus Feedback
inherent_skill2.description: For every Heavy Attack on hit, restores HP to the nearby team member with the least HP equal to 0.25% of Baizhi's Max HP.

intro_skill.name: Overflowing Frost
intro_skill.description: Calls You'tan to perform 1 plunging attack, dealing Glacio DMG while restoring HP to all nearby team members.

outro_skill.name: Rejuvenating Flow
outro_skill.description: Restores HP equal to 1.54% of Baizhi’s Max HP to the next character (or other characters on a nearby team that activates an Outro Skill) every 3s for 30s. Recipients also gain 15% all-Type DMG Deepen for 6s.

resonance_chain.s1: Emergency Plan additionally restores 2.5 Resonance Energy for every 1 "Concentration" consumed.
resonance_chain.s2: Emergency Plan increases Baizhi's Glacio DMG Bonus by 15% and her Healing by 15% if she has 4 "Concentration"; lasts 12s.
resonance_chain.s3: Overflowing Frost increases Baizhi's Max HP by 12% for 10s.
resonance_chain.s4: Upon casting Momentary Union, Remnant Entities gain: +2 additional activations, +20% healing multiplier, and deal extra Glacio DMG equal to 1.20% of Baizhi's Max HP.
resonance_chain.s5: If a team member is downed while Baizhi is alive, immediately revives them and restores HP to 100% of their Max HP. Can trigger once every 10 minutes.
resonance_chain.s6: When Euphonia is picked up, increases the Glacio DMG Bonus of all nearby characters by 12% for 20s.
